comment.author: 67254707@N06
comment._content: I find this picture fascinating because I visited this area when I was in India!

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comment, John. How cool that you've been to this area!  Mennonite work in India was concentrated in a few areas, Bihar being one of them.  Bihar was actually a mission field for the Missionary Church (formerly the United Missionary Church, formerly the Mennonite Brethren in Christ), so we don't have a lot of records about Bihar.  We have far more holdings about work in Madhya Pradesh.
